scripts.install: npm run install-app && npm run install-admin
scripts.build: cd feathers-admin && npm run build && cp -r build/* ../feathers-app/public/
scripts.start: npm run build && cd feathers-app && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-local
scripts.test-local: testcafe all test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
scripts.test-travis: npm run build && testcafe "saucelabs:Chrome" test/*.js --app "cd feathers-app && node src/index.js"
